content: i designed this adorable little wrist wallet to be worn when you don t feel like carrying a purse if you are a mom like me you start feeling like a pack mule after you load up on all the stuff you have to carry i have often wished i had something just like this when shopping or going out on a date this would also be great to wear when you do market fairs the design could also be used for a great gift idea to a coffee lover simply place on a coffee tumbler add a gift card and voila wrist wallet/coffee cozy/gift card holder all in one **the best part about this project is it is worked seamlessly with only 2 ends to weave in with only a tiny bit of sewing for the center bow ** supplies needed - 50- 75 yds of cotton/cotton blend dk yarn size 3 such as lion brand comfy cotton blend or lion brand coboo if you choose to use coboo you may need to go up a hook size or crochet more loosely note you could also use acrylic yarn but it will stretch quite a bit - crochet hook size f 3 75 mm or size needed to obtain gauge - 2 5 6 4 cm piece of ribbon or leather for center embellishment optional - 1 8 or 10 mm bead for button or you could use a button but it would need to be size 7/16 /11 mm - clear nylon sewing thread or sewing thread in the color of your choice - scissors measuring tape regular sewing needle and yarn needle terminology and abbreviations used pattern is written in us terminology back loop only - blo chain s - chain s decrease - decrease fasten_off - fo front loop only flo place bead - pb single_crochet - single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch stitch es - st s special stitches -picot chain 3 single_crochet in the 3rd chain from your hook -place bead bring bead flush to your hook complete st as normal gauge chain 12 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and in each st across 11 single_crochet row 2-11 chain 1 turn place 1 single_crochet in each st across 11 single_crochet finished swatch should measure 2 x 2 5 x 5 cm finished measurements open pocket should measure approximately 5 5 14 cm from tip of button hole to bottom of pocket in length it is 2 25 6 cm in width the thinner cuff is 2 5 6 5 cm wide the wider cuff is 3 8 cm wide
